headline: Ford Sales Grow in August. It Can’t Build This Expensive SUV Fast Enough.
summary: Ford sold 8,724 Expeditions to Americans in August. That’s the best sales month for the large SUV in 21 years, according to the company.

raw.headline: Ford Sales Grow in August. It Can’t Build This Expensive SUV Fast Enough.
raw.summary: Ford sold 8,724 Expeditions to Americans in August. That’s the best sales month for the large SUV in 21 years, according to the company.

headline: Ford sees EV sales skyrocket in August as buyers rush to beat tax credit deadline
summary: Ford's sales of EVs skyrocketed by 19% to a total of 10,671 sold in August. Year to date, however, Ford's EV sales are down 5.7% at 57,888 sold.

raw.headline: Ford sees EV sales skyrocket in August as buyers rush to beat tax credit deadline
raw.summary: Ford's sales of EVs skyrocketed by 19% to a total of 10,671 sold in August. Year to date, however, Ford's EV sales are down 5.7% at 57,888 sold.

headline: Ford, Kia, Hyundai sales charge higher in August, shaking off tariffs and fueled by EVs
summary: Ford, Kia, and Hyundai sales revved higher in August as consumers shook off tariff effects for now and dove into EVs before tax credits expire.

raw.headline: Ford, Kia, Hyundai sales charge higher in August, shaking off tariffs and fueled by EVs
raw.summary: Ford, Kia, and Hyundai sales revved higher in August as consumers shook off tariff effects for now and dove into EVs before tax credits expire.

headline: US corporate debt market returns in force after market holiday
summary: At least 27 issuers tapped the high-grade corporate bond market on Tuesday, according to market participants -- the first day of the Labor Day holiday-shortened week that is historically the busiest of the year for high-grade bond market deal-making.  American pharmaceutical company Merck turned to the bond market for $5 billion to help fund its $10 billion buyout of peer Verona Pharma announced on July 9.  All told, Tuesday tallied at least $40.8 billion in high-grade corporate bond sales at market close, according to Hans Mikkelsen, managing director of credit strategy at TD Securities.

headline: Ford Sales Rise in August, Led by EVs
summary: Ford reported a 3.9% increase in August sales, including year-over-year growth across all of its car types.

raw.headline: Ford Sales Rise in August, Led by EVs
raw.summary: Ford reported a 3.9% increase in August sales, including year-over-year growth across all of its car types.

headline: EV Armageddon? Tesla, GM, Ford EV sales will be cut in half when tax credit expires, analyst says.
summary: Electric vehicle makers like Tesla, GM, and Ford will be in a world of pain when the federal EV tax credit expires later this month — with sales of EVs in the US expected to drop by half.

raw.headline: EV Armageddon? Tesla, GM, Ford EV sales will be cut in half when tax credit expires, analyst says.
raw.summary: Electric vehicle makers like Tesla, GM, and Ford will be in a world of pain when the federal EV tax credit expires later this month — with sales of EVs in the US expected to drop by half.
